Choose Our Perfect Tariff Plans Basic Plan ₹500/month - Up to 25 Mbps speed - 100 GB data cap - Email support - Installation charges may apply Up to 25 Mbps Choose Standard Plan ₹800/month - Up to 50 Mbps speed - 250 GB data cap - Email and phone support - Free installation Up to 50 Mbps Choose Premium Plan ₹1200/month - Up to 100 Mbps speed - 500 GB data cap - Email, phone, and chat support - Free installation and modem rental Up to 100 Mbps Choose Ultimate Plan ₹2000/month - Up to 200 Mbps speed - Unlimited data - 24/7 customer support - Free installation, modem, and router Up to 200 Mbps Choose Interesting questions from our clients 1. What types of internet plans do you offer? We offer a variety of internet plans to suit different needs, including basic, standard, premium, and ultimate plans, each with varying speeds and data allowances. 2. Is there a contract required for your services? No, we offer both contract and no-contract options to our customers, providing flexibility based on their preferences. 3. How can I pay for my internet services? We accept various payment methods, including online payments, bank transfers, and cash payments at our designated centers. 4. Do you offer any discounts or promotions? Yes, we periodically run promotions and offer discounts to both new and existing customers. Be sure to check our website or contact our customer support for the latest offers. 5. What happens if I exceed my data allowance? If you exceed your data allowance, your internet speed may be reduced or you may incur additional charges, depending on your plan. We also offer data add-ons for purchase if needed. 6. How can I contact your customer support? You can reach our customer support team through phone, email, or live chat on our website. We are available 24/7 to assist you with any inquiries or technical support. Get in Touch with Us Have questions or ready to sign up for our services? Fill out the form below, and our team will get back to you shortly. We're here to assist you with any inquiries, technical support, or assistance you may need. Connect with us today and experience seamless internet connectivity with ConnectIndia Broadband. pages.privacy: ConnectIndia Broadband - High-Speed Internet Provider in India | Privacy Policy Home About us What we offer Reviews Prices FAQ Contact us Privacy Policy Introduction Welcome to our Privacy Policy page. This policy describes how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information when you use our website. By accessing or using the website, you agree to the terms of this policy. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. Information We Collect We collect various types of information when you visit our website. This may include your name, email address, phone number, IP address, browser type, and other information that you voluntarily provide to us. We also use cookies and similar tracking technologies to collect data about your interactions with our website. Additionally, we may receive information about you from third-party sources, such as social media platforms, when you interact with our content or advertisements. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect to provide and improve our services, communicate with you, personalize your experience, and analyze the effectiveness of our marketing efforts. We may also use your information to comply with legal obligations, protect our rights, and prevent fraud. Information Sharing and Disclosure We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy. We may share your information with trusted service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or serving you, as long as they agree to keep your information confidential. We may also disclose your information in response to legal requests or subpoenas, to enforce our policies, or to protect the rights, property, or safety of our users or others. Security We take reasonable precautions to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, so we cannot guarantee absolute security. Changes to This Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page. Contact us at connectindiabroadband@gmail.com 13, Old Rangpuri Rd, K-Block, Mahipalpur Extension, Mahipalpur, New Delhi, Delhi 110037, India connectindiabroadband@gmail.com +91 99 9064 2724 Privacy policy Terms and conditions
